data.eml:eml: Synopsis of Nekemias Raf., a segregate genus from Ampelopsis Michx. (Vitaceae) disjunct between eastern / southeastern Asia and eastern North America, with ten new combinations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wen, Jun, Boggan, John, Nie, Ze-Long (2014): Synopsis of Nekemias Raf., a segregate genus from Ampelopsis Michx. (Vitaceae) disjunct between eastern / southeastern Asia and eastern North America, with ten new combinations. PhytoKeys 42: 11-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.42.7704, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.42.7704
